{{Description|Skilled astrologers have always dreamed of using a phantom facsimile of themselves to ward off imminent ill fate, but Mona must be the first to make such a mockery of it in all of Teyvat.}}
'''Mirror Reflection of Doom''' is [[Mona]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|particles|the Phantom Explosion|3.33}}
* The skill deals {{Color|Hydro DMG}} every second, for a total of 4 times.
* {{TalentNote|icd|Skill DMG}}
* {{TalentNote|icd|Explosion DMG|0}}
* The hold version of this skill grants Mona a brief period of [[Invincibility Frames]].
* {{TalentNote|character=Mona|talent=Mirror Reflection of Doom|ascension|2|"Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!"}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|Mockery of Fortuna}}
